doc.author: liangwei
doc.description: GSM核心网络主用系统月报

sql.name: gsmcoreinternet_monthly_reportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: gsmcoreinternet_monthly_report.group
gsmcoreinternet_monthly_report.left
sql.item: select distinct trim('GSM交换机数量合计（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('传统电路交换机数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('基于TDM承载的软交换机MSC Server数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('基于IP承载的软交换机MSC Server数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('GSM交换机容量合计（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('传统电路交换机容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('基于TDM承载的软交换机MSC Server容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('基于IP承载的软交换机MSC Server容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('GSM900交换机数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('GSM900交换机容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('GSM1800交换机数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('GSM1800交换机容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('GSM900M与1800M合设交换机数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('GSM900M与1800M合设交换机容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('基于软交换的媒体网关MGW数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('HLR数量（个）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('HLR容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('AUC容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('交换机VLR数据库容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('传统电路交换机VLR数据库容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('基于TDM承载的软交换机VLR数据库容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual union all select distinct trim('基于IP承载的软交换机VLR数据库容量（户）') as 指标名称 from dual

sql.name: gsmcoreinternet_monthly_report.centervalue
sql.item: select distinct trim('GSM交换机数量合计（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('传统电路交换机数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000007),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('基于TDM承载的软交换机MSC Server数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('基于IP承载的软交换机MSC Server数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('GSM交换机容量合计（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000013),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('传统电路交换机容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000015),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('基于TDM承载的软交换机MSC Server容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('基于IP承载的软交换机MSC Server容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('GSM900交换机数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('GSM900交换机容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000024),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('GSM1800交换机数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000026),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('GSM1800交换机容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000033),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('GSM900M与1800M合设交换机数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000035),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('GSM900M与1800M合设交换机容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000038),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('基于软交换的媒体网关MGW数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000036),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('HLR数量（个）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000040),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('HLR容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000042),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('AUC容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000044),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('交换机VLR数据库容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000046),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('传统电路交换机VLR数据库容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000048),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('基于TDM承载的软交换机VLR数据库容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000050),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('基于IP承载的软交换机VLR数据库容量（户）'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000052),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 and t.c802000002 is not null {5} group by t.c802000002
